system.description:
"Secrets hidden beneath your seamless alloy."

You have a disguised compartment integrated into your Cyberarm unit that can hold a few small items (about 64 cm^2 of storage). Impossible to detect without a physical search of the arm.

Requires Cyberarm™ base unit
